post_content:
** Affordable, lower grade T-cards **

I’m excited to begin to offer for sale a wonderful collection of vintage cards over the next several weeks - some will be raw and others graded but all will be priced to sell and will be listed in multiple locations.  

So if you spy something you like, please do reach out quickly.

To start, here are some well loved raw T cards of classic HOFers.  The photos should show the condition for each card and the prices reflect the condition of each card.  

PayPal only please, add $10 for safe and secure shipping.

Thx all

Jeff Gross

****************************

T206 HOF Chief Bender - $150
T206 HOF Frank Chance - $150
T206 HOF Hughie Jennings - $150
T206 HOF Rube Marquard - $125

T202 with HOFer Joe Tinker -$100 
(please note 4 pin holes in corner and some tearing in center panel)
Oops, trying again… back if cards here.
